alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN FLAGLER...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND EASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fruitland, or near Crescent City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia, Saint Augustine Beach, and Marineland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
